overview: Based on the book 'Dying To Live' this film is the inspiring true story of Dr. Shonda Reynolds . A native of Pulaski, Tennessee she overcame addiction after entering drug rehab, where she had a spiritual awakening and excepted her calling to preach. This true to live film is about a life being transformed by the power of God through forgiveness, redemption and love from a life of addiction.
title: Still Got Joy
